name: Split (itch) (seen103)
description:
Make sure to play in fullscreen by pressing the blue arrows button in the bottom right corner.

Controls

Left: A

Right: D

Jump: W or Space

Split: Mouse Press

Merge: Automatic

Viewport Zoom: Mouse Scroll

Citations

Poliigon. (n.d.). Instant shaders. Poliigon. https://www.poliigon.com/.
